puzzle.help: 1. Draw a single non intersecting, continuous looping path which must follow these rules at every traffic light: 2. While passing on green lights, the road must go straight, it can't turn. 3. While passing on red lights, the road must turn 90 degrees. 4. While passing on yellow lights, the road might turn 90 degrees or go straight. 5. A number on the light tells you the length of the straights coming out of that tile.
